attributes.action: Give our NHS staff and NHS outsourced workers a substantial pay rise now.
attributes.additional_details:
All NHS and subcontracted workers to the NHS such as outsourced Caterers, Porters, Domestic Staff, Estates & Maintenance staff etc should recieve at least an immediate 15% increase in their salaries for their incredible work in keeping us all safe.

They all should have been being paid at this level anyway but even more so due to their sacrifices for us during this awful time of National and International emergency.

There can be no excuses, pay them properly now for their heroic efforts.
attributes.background: UK Government - Give our NHS staff and NHS outsourced/subcontracted workers to the NHS such as outsourced Caterers, Porters, Domestic Staff, Estates & Maintenance staff etc an immediate 15% increase in their salaries for their incredible work in keeping us all safe during this pandemic.
